casebody.data:
RUSER, Respondent, v. UNION DISTILLING CO., Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. May 17, 1894.) Action by Ludwig Ruser against the Union Distilling Company.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

S. E. Duffy, for appellant. J. A. McCreery, for respondent.

No opinion. Motion for leave to appeal to the court of appeals denied, with $10 costs. See 27 N. Y. Supp. 920.
